des: "These nutty treats are sweet and chocolaty. Currants, dates, pecans and honey are blended into a dough, and formed into candies."
ins: In the container of a food processor or blender, combine the dates, sunflower seeds, pecans, raisins, and cocoa powder. Transfer to a bowl, and stir in honey. Press into 1 inch balls, and roll in confectioners' sugar. Store in an airtight container at room temperature.
